understandingRelationships.question: When you're trying to understand a complex issue, do you look at the individual parts separately, or do you try to understand how they all interact and affect each other?

options.text: I tend to look at each part separately.

options.text: Rarely, I focus on the immediate challenge.
Always, I think about its context and larger environment.
Sometimes, it depends on the situation.

options.text: I often struggle to identify patterns or trends.
